title: AU Small Finance Q3 PAT declines 37% YoY to Rs 302 cr - Business Standard
content: AU Small Finance Q3 PAT declines 37% YoY to Rs 302 cr  Business Standard
description: The small finance bank reported a 37% decline in standalone net profit to Rs 302.05 crore on a 9% fall in total income to Rs 1,772.09 crore in Q3 FY22 over Q3 FY21.
